W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: You've obtained a triangle. It's time to return to the Twilight Area and search for the next.

W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You've now obtained all of the triangles. It's time to unravel the truth about them and the president.

W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.text: Perhaps the time has come to enlist their help with your search for a triangle.

W10_GIMK_BOFO_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_BOFO_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.text: Are the triangular objects in the lower level connected to this fiend in some way?

W10_GIMK_BOFO_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_BOFO_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.text: Are the triangular objects in the lower level connected to this fiend in some way?

W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a space station like something from a sci-fi movie on the other side of the door. Can you really find a triangle in such a place?
